Telantarkan Jemaah, Kemenag Cabut Izin Tiga Travel Umroh
05 Nov 2019, 18:09 by Munjir Permana


Telantarkan Jemaah, Kemenag Cabut Izin Tiga Travel Umroh

KBRN, Banda Aceh : Kementerian Agama (Kemenag) mencabut tiga izin penyelenggara atau travel perjalanan  ibadah umroh karena dianggap telah melakukan pelanggaran dengan mengabaikan hak jemaah. 
Kasubbid Pemantauan dan Pengawasan Umrah dan Ibadah Haji Khusus pada Direktorat Bina Umrah dan Haji Khusus, Kementerian Agama M. Noer Alya Fitra mengatakan, kasus tersebut akan dirilis dalam waktu dekat. 
“Yang akan kita cabut ada tiga (travel), tapi ada beberapa yang ditegur, karena pelanggarannya tidak terlalu parah, kalau parah kali baru kita cabut,” kata M. Noer pada awak media saat menghadiri rapat koordinasi dan sosialisasi izin operasional penyelenggaraan perjalanan ibadah umrah Provinsi Aceh Tahun 2019 di Aula Arafah Asrama Haji Embarkasi Aceh, di Banda Aceh, Selasa (5/11/2019). 
Dia menjelaskan, pelanggaran yang dilakukan ke tiga travel ini termasuk pelanggaran berat sesuai regulasi yang telah ditentukan. 
“Kasus yang kita rilis terkait dengan pelanggaran masa tinggal, visa. Jadi ada jemaah diberangkatkan yang seharusnya satu bulan, masa visanya kan satu bulan? tapi dia (jemaah) sampai berbulan-bulan bahkan bertahun-tahun tidak pulang, dan dia (pihak travel) tidak ada upaya untuk mencari dan jumlah jemaah yang diberangkatkan ini banyak. Kalau satu dua orang bisa dibilang itu hilang atau sebagainya, tapi ini ramai dan tidak ada petugasnya,” ungkap M. Noer. 
Kemudian kata M. Noer ada pelanggaran lain yang juga ditemukan, modusnya tidak menyediakan tiket pulang untuk jemaah yang sudah diberangkatkan ke tanah suci.  
“Kemudian ada juga yang tidak menyediakan tiket pulang. Jemaahnya sampai Arab Saudi mau pulang tidak ada tiket, terkatung-katunglah dia di Jeddah, kemudian dilapor ke Kementerian Agama maka baru ribut soal penelantaran karena tidak tiket,” jelasnya. 
Namun, M. Noer tidak merincikan nama travel yang dicabut izin tersebut. Dia hanya bilang travel itu berizin. 
“Travel ini berizin, justru ini sekarang sudah kita cabut izinya. Kita mensyaratkan travel itu harus punya sertifikat biro perjalanan wisata, tentu di segi keuangan manajerial, SDM mereka harus punya, tapi ini tidak punya. Kalau tidak punya maka kami cabut,” tegasnya. 
Sementara di Aceh sendiri, ada juga agen perjalanan ibadah umroh tak berizin sudah dilaporkan ke ranah hukum. Travel ini diduga tidak memberangkatkan jemaah ke tanah suci padahal jemaah sudah melunasi biaya perjalanan. 
Kabid Penyelenggara Haji dan Umrah (PHU) Kementrian Agama Provinsi Aceh Samhudi mengatakan, kasus penipuan jemaah umroh oleh travel bodong ini juga ditemukan di Banda Aceh dan sudah dilaporkan ke Polda Aceh. 
“Kasusnya ada, itu kantornya di kawasan Kecamatan Kuta Alam, tapi tidak berizin (bodong). Itu sudah ke Polda Aceh. Kemudian ada lagi, pemiliknya adalah salah satu tokoh di Aceh yang sempat maju caleg juga kemarin, tapi sudah banyak laporan juga ke Polda. Itu kasusnya tidak memberangkatkan jemaah dalam waktu yang lama, tapi udah di Polda juga, karena mereka tidak ada izin,” ungkap Samhudi.

Abandoning Congregation, Ministry of Religion Revokes Licenses of Three Umrah Travel
05 Nov 2019, 18:09 by Munjir Permana


Abandoning Congregation, Ministry of Religion Revokes Licenses of Three Umrah Travel

KBRN, Banda Aceh: The Ministry of Religion (Kemenag) revoked three permits of organizers or Umrah pilgrimage trips because they were considered to have violated the rights of the congregation.
Head of Sub Unit for Monitoring and Supervision of Umrah and Special Hajj at the Directorate of Bina Umrah and Special Hajj, Ministry of Religion M. Noer Alya Fitra said the case will be released in the near future.
"We will revoke three (travel), but there are some who are reprimanded, because the violations are not too severe, if we are not serious, we will remove them," M. Noer told the media when attending a coordination meeting and socialization of operational permits for organizing Umrah pilgrimage trips. Aceh Province in 2019 in the Arafat Halls of the Aceh Embarkation Hajj Hall, in Banda Aceh, Tuesday (11/5/2019).
He explained, violations committed to these three travels included serious violations in accordance with predetermined regulations.
"The case we released is related to violations of the period of stay, visas. So there are pilgrims who should depart for one month, the visa period is one month, right? but he (pilgrims) for months and even years did not go home, and he (the travel) there was no effort to find and the number of pilgrims who departed this much. If one or two people can say it's missing or something, but it's busy and there are no officers, "said M. Noer.
Then said M. Noer there were other violations that were also found, the mode of not providing return tickets for pilgrims who had been dispatched to the holy land.
"Then there are also those who don't provide a return ticket. His congregation until Saudi Arabia wanted to go home there were no tickets, he was adrift in Jeddah, then reported to the Ministry of Religion so it was only a matter of neglect because there were no tickets, "he explained.
However, M. Noer did not specify the name of the travel permit revoked. He only said that travel was licensed.
"This travel is licensed, we have revoked this license now. We require that travel must have a travel agency certificate, of course in terms of managerial finance, their human resources must have, but this does not have. If we don't have it, we will remove it, "he stressed.
While in Aceh itself, there are also unlicensed Umrah pilgrimage travel agencies that have been reported to the realm of law. This trip allegedly did not send the pilgrims to the holy land even though the pilgrims had paid the travel expenses.
Head of Hajj and Umrah Organizers (PHU) of the Ministry of Religion of the Province of Aceh Samhudi said, cases of pilgrimage fraud by bulging travels were also found in Banda Aceh and had been reported to the Aceh Regional Police.
"The case is there, the office is in the area of Kuta Alam District, but it is not licensed. It has already been to the Aceh Regional Police. Then there is another, the owner is one of the figures in Aceh who had advanced the legislative candidates yesterday, but there have been many reports to the Regional Police. That is the case for not sending the congregation for a long time, but they have already been in the Regional Police too, because they don't have permission, "said Samhudi.
